name: ALEK
description:
Post-soviet Russia, Tyumen in 1995. Alexey Smirnov, a local shot-caller, nicknamed 'Alek' found out about the death of his friends and swore to avenge. The bloody war started between the gangs of the city. However, a true enemy turned out not to be common gangsters, but men much scarier


- Immerse gloomy atmosphere of Russian life in the 90s.
- You will have to go through a large number of locations, from slums and gloomy back streets to luxurious restaurants and saunas in Tyumen.
- You will have an impressive arsenal of deadly Russian-made weapons.
- Do not expect mercy, because this is the 90s. You'll have to survive!
